metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing a supplementary statement of his son's account including the $500 recently received. Stearns says he values Kwan's kind words. He states it is a pleasure to work with a fine student like Sung Sing and Chinese students (with one exception) who demonstrate such natural refinement and respect for authority.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
